name: specswarm-marketplace
description: Complete software development lifecycle with spec-driven workflows, quality validation, and experimental autonomous features

plugins.name: specswarm
plugins.description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v2.1: Enhanced git workflow with parent branch detection.

plugins.name: speclabs
plugins.description: Experimental laboratory for autonomous development with Agent-Based Orchestration Engine. v2.2.1: PROJECT_PATH now optional (defaults to pwd). v2.2.0: True autonomous execution via Task tool. Use at your own risk.

plugins.name: speckit
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecSwarm v2.0+. Use SpecSwarm instead for spec-driven development workflows.

plugins.name: spectest
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecSwarm v2.0+. Performance enhancements now included in SpecSwarm.

plugins.name: speclab
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecSwarm v2.0+. Lifecycle workflows now included in SpecSwarm.

plugins.name: project-orchestrator
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecLabs v1.0+. Autonomous development now unified with advanced debugging in experimental SpecLabs plugin

plugins.name: debug-coordinate
plugins.description: ⚠️ DEPRECATED - Merged into SpecLabs v1.0+. Advanced debugging now unified with autonomous development in experimental SpecLabs plugin
